title: Movie Review
description: This site was built using web APIs where we took information about many popular movie reviews. You can search any movie and you can see the review of this movie from several websites.

title: Doctor Schedular
description: Our group wanted to make a website that can allow a doctor to set up appointments with their patients. A patient can sign up and schedule an appointment today>

title: Fitness Tracker
description: This is an application that can track your daily workouts.

title: Budget Tracker
description: A progressive web application to keep track of your withdrawals and deposits using mongoDB and indexedDB.

title: Note Taker
description: A note taking app using an express backend to save and retrieve note data from a database.

title: Day Planner
description: A day planner using moments.js and local storage to keep track of a 9 to 5 workday.
